text: Duvvada Jagannadham, abbreviated as DJ, is a 2017 Indian Telugu-language vigilante comedy film written and directed by Harish Shankar and produced by Dil Raju under his banner Sri Venkateswara Creations. The film stars Allu Arjun and Pooja Hegde in the lead roles, while Rao Ramesh, Subbaraju, Chandra Mohan, and Murali Sharma play supporting roles. Devi Sri Prasad composed the film's music, while Ayananka Bose handled the cinematography. Principal photography commenced in August 2016 in Hyderabad. The production crew also chose Abu Dhabi as a filming location, as they would benefit from the Emirate's 30% film production rebate. The film grossed approximately 115.10 crore in its theatrical run. == Plot == Duvvada Jagannadham Shastri (Allu Arjun) is a cook working as a caterer in Vijayawada along with his family. He rescues a high-profile cop named Purushottam (Murali Sharma) from the attack of a crime mafia in Hyderabad. Seeing the quality of a rebellion in the priest and his sharpshooting skills, Purushottam trains Jagannadham to become DJ, an undercover officer who fights crime in the disguise of a Brahmin priest. Jagannadham falls in love with Pooja (Pooja Hegde) the daughter of a corrupt home minister named Pushpam (Posani Krishna Murali) involved with yet another real estate crime lord, Royyala Naidu (Rao Ramesh). Royyala Naidu operates Naidu Industries and the Agro Diamond Financing company in disguise. On the other hand, DJ decides to take on Royyala Naidu in his mission but does not know who he is in actual life. The rest of the story is how DJ uses Royyala Naidu's son Royyala Avinash (Subbaraju), who suffers with histrionic personality disorder, and through him, DJ destroys Royyala Naidu's corrupt business empire, thereby rescuing the Agro Diamond scam victims. == Cast == * Allu Arjun as Duvvada Jagannadham Shastri / DJ * Pooja Hegde as Pooja"Pooja Hegde finalised for Allu Arjun's next". Times of India (15 September 2016) * Rao Ramesh as Royyala Naidu * Subbaraju as Royyala Avinash / Chanti * Chandra Mohan as DJ's uncle * Murali Sharma as Purushottam * Posani Krishna Murali as Home Minister Pushpam * Tanikella Bharani as Duvvada Subrahmanyam Shastri * Vennela Kishore as Akella Vigneshwara Sharma * Harish Uthaman as Sultan Basha * Pavitra Lokesh as DJ's mother * Hari Teja as DJ's elder sister * Vidyullekha Raman as Katyayini * Sameer as Sameera Chandra, CEO of Agro Diamond * Shashank as DJ's assistant * Sivannarayana Naripeddi as Vignesh's father * Rajitha as Vignesh's mother * Prabhakar as Suri * Jeeva as Bujji * Shatru as Badda Stephen Prakash * Shanoor Sana as Pooja's mother * Sravan as DJ's assistant * Giridhar as DJ's friend * Jhansi == Production == Initially, Shruti Haasan and Kajal Aggarwal were approached to play the lead actress, but Pooja Hegde was eventually finalized for that role. The film team placed a statue of Lord Shiva in Chennakeshava Temple in Belur. This is against the custom and tradition of the temple and was opposed by the temple priests.Manaswini K (18 February 2017) Protestors Stalled Allu Arjun’s DJ Shoot. mirchi9.com The film team obtained permission from the Department of History and Archaeology for the shoot and resumed it. The film completed the shooting of major action episodes at the aluminum factory in Hyderabad on 21 April 2017. == Soundtrack == The Music was composed by Devi Sri Prasad and Released by Aditya Music. == Release == The film's release was originally scheduled for 19 May 2017, but it was postponed to 23 June 2017. ==Accolades== ===Filmfare Awards=== * Best Music Director - Devi Sri Prasad - Nominatedhttps://m.filmfare.com/features/nominations-for-the-65th-jio- filmfare-awards-south-2018_-28652-1.html ===Zee Telugu Cine Awards=== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ; |- style="background:#ccc; text- align:center;" ! style="width:30%;"| Category ! style="width:35%;"| Nominee ! style="width:10%;"| Result |- | Best Director | Harish Shankar | |- | Favourite Hero of the Year | Allu Arjun | |- | Favourite Heroine of the Year | Pooja Hegde | |- | Best Actor in Negative Role | Rao Ramesh | |- | Best Music Director | Devi Sri Prasad | |- | Best Male Singer | Jaspreet Jasz (song-"Seeti Maar") | |- | Best Dialogue | Harish Shankar | |- | Best Choreography | Sekhar Master | |- | Best Cinematographer | Ayananka Bose | |- | Best Costume Designer | Subarna Rai | |} == References == == External links == * Category:2017 films Category:2010s Telugu-language films Category:Indian films Category:Films directed by Harish Shankar Category:Films scored by Devi Sri Prasad Category:Films shot in Karnataka Category:Films about corruption in India Category:Films shot in Hyderabad, India Category:Films shot in Abu Dhabi Category:Histrionic personality disorder in fiction Category:Films shot in the United Arab Emirates Category:2010s vigilante films Category:Indian vigilante films Category:Indian action comedy films Category:2017 action comedy films Category:Films shot in Vijayawada Category:Films set in Vijayawada Category:2017 comedy films
title: Duvvada Jagannadham
